measured_by: Teacher Sense of Efficacy Scale (TSES) – adapted 3 items
justification: "We measured self-efficacy with items adapted from the Teacher Sense of Efficacy Scale (TSES, Tschannen-Moran & Woolfolk Hoy, 2001)."

measured_by: Occupational Commitment Scale (Hackett et al.) – adapted 3 items
justification: "Three items adapted from Hackett et al.'s occupational commitment scale … were employed to assess participants' interest in exploring teaching as a career."
construct: Interest in exploring a teaching career

measured_by: Chuang et al.’s Attribute-Match items (Perceived Person-Environment Fit Scale) – adapted
justification: "Three items adapted from Chuang et al. … were used to measure the perceived match between participants' own attributes and the attributes required for a teaching career."

measured_by: Single item from Hackett et al.’s Occupational Commitment Scale
justification: "Hackett et al. (2001) was used to measure participants' career intentions prior to working on the scenario-based task ('After I graduate, I am interested in exploring a career as a teacher')."
The study examined "person-vocation fit as measured in a brief RJP intervention" where "the total score … was shown to the participants and they received a 'fit' message."
